name: [Group 21] Salty Sands
description:
Salty Sands is a hack’n’slash game for up to four players, who are thrown in arena of undead, facing waves of enemies they need to defeat together. Or perhaps not? The best fighter becomes the boss, so it is up to you whether you want to intervene with other players getting kills!

Every player chooses a different class to play with, which there are four of.
All classes have their own unique abilities and playstyle, it is up to the player to use different tactics on different classes. Each class has a basic attack, a movement ability and an offensive ability, as well as an ultimate attack that requires to be charged by damaging enemies.

Pickups will be thrown into the arena to help you, but beware of the beast that guards them!

Once all waves of enemies have been defeated, the best fighter becomes the boss! The other players have to team up and try defeat the boss, but they only get one shot at it. 

Our standard game mode has three length and difficulty settings.
We also have an endless mode and a pvp only mode besides the standard game mode.
